arts.ttl: Jim Goodwin takes Aberdeen implosion as cautionary Dundee Utd tale as triumphant boss roars 'I wish season was over NOW'
arts.sum: Sam Dalby's Dens Park winner sparked wild scenes in the away end and pushed United above Aberdeen in the table

arts.ttl: 'It hurts' – Jimmy Thelin gets real over Aberdeen misery business but declares he WILL turn it around
arts.sum: The Dons are sinking like a stone after a 2-1 defeat to Ross County on Thursday

arts.ttl: Noah Chilvers winner edges Ross County to victory at out-of-form Aberdeen
arts.sum: Kevin Nisbet cancelled out Akil Wright’s opener before Noah Chilvers’ winner.

arts.ttl: Aberdeen vs Ross County latest as Dons give definitive update on status of Pittodrie Premiership clash
arts.sum: Heavy snow in the North East had led to doubts over whether the game would be able to go ahead

arts.ttl: Aberdeen seek reform as tribunal sets Barron fee
arts.sum: Aberdeen are awarded a fee by tribunal for Connor Barron's move to Rangers but call for reform over the compensation process.

arts.ttl: Graeme Shinnie maps out how Aberdeen can turns things around as he refutes battle for second 'write off'
arts.sum: The Dons have struggled through the festive period

arts.ttl: Kevin Nisbet's Aberdeen future addressed by Jimmy Thelin as Millwall recall trigger hangs over transfer window
arts.sum: The striker has netted just four goals in 14 matches for the Dons since making the loan switch last summer

arts.ttl: Apoplectic Aberdeen unload on Rangers Connor Barron compensation fee
arts.sum: The Dons have released a stinging statement in which they have called for a major review

arts.ttl: How Calvin Ramsay's dream transfer to Liverpool has rapidly became a nightmare as ex Aberdeen kid stuck in limbo
arts.sum: Ramsay sealed a dream move to Liverpool in June 2022 but the right-back has endured a torrid time ever since leaving Pittodrie

arts.ttl: Aberdeen aren't the only ones miffed by Connor Barron tribunal as fee for Rangers star has alarm bells ringing
arts.sum: The Gers have been ordered to pay Aberdeen £600,000 for Barron by an independent tribunal.
